message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.IOException' import. Should be before 'javax.annotation.ParametersAreNonnullByDefault'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.ArrayList' import. Should be before 'javax.annotation.ParametersAreNonnullByDefault'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'javax.annotation.ParametersAreNonnullByDefault'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.NoSuchElementException' import. Should be before 'javax.annotation.ParametersAreNonnullByDefault'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Optional' import. Should be before 'javax.annotation.ParametersAreNonnullByDefault'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.stream.Stream' import. Should be before 'javax.annotation.ParametersAreNonnullByDefault'.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - com.mongodb.client.model.Updates.*.
'.' should be on a new line.
'.' should be on a new line.
'&&' should be on a new line.
'{' at column 126 should be on a new line.
WhitespaceAround: 'for' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: '{' is not preceded with whitespace.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: '==' is not preceded with whitespace.
WhitespaceAround: '==' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: '{' is not preceded with whitespace.
